amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding in the bill by one percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to provide for a 1% across the board reduction in funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 309 (Roll no. 427).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Hefley.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 309 (Roll no. 427).
